jailInfo.releaseHours: 24/7 - Bond posting available 24 hours a day
blackoutPeriods: Attorney visits discouraged 1:30-3:00 PM (staff shift change)
paymentMethods: Cashier's check (payable to 'Harris County Sheriff's Office')
Money order (payable to 'Harris County Sheriff's Office')
specialNotes: Municipal Courts Jail Bonding Window also 24/7
Daylight release policy for inmates who have served sentence (2012 policy)

schedule.dwiFirst: Typical range: $500-$5,000 (varies by BAC and circumstances)
schedule.prBondEligibility: Possible for first-time DWI offenders - check bond schedule for 'Presumption of PR Bond' notes

releaseRequirements: Valid state or federally issued ID (can be from another country)
One of: notarized power of attorney, tax collector's receipt with registration renewal, current lease/rental agreement, or TDLR Personal Vehicle Owner Removal form

fees.towingMax: Contact facility - Texas TDLR regulates maximum fees
fees.storageDailyMax: Contact facility - Texas TDLR regulates maximum fees

specialRules: Notarized documents from out-of-state are valid and must be accepted by storage facilities
If tow yard's credit card machine is down, they cannot charge storage past that date (Texas TDLR statute)
TDLR Personal Vehicle Owner Removal and Inspection forms available for download

freeLots: 1401 Congress garage - entrances on La Branch and Austin streets
Must bring parking ticket to have it validated
Arrive early as garage fills up quickly
shuttles: FREE METRO transit - show jury assignment copy for free bus/light rail
Use METRO trip planner online or app to find routes to 1201 Congress (El Franco Lee Public Service Plaza)
parking.rates: FREE with validation for jurors; Free METRO with jury assignment

dressCode: Check Courtroom Decorum pages for specific requirements
prohibitedItems: Cell phones (restricted in some courtrooms - check local rules)
securityNotes: Harris County explicitly bans muscle shirts
Lighters will be confiscated at security
No in/out privileges at juror parking garage
